src:
Wishnutama Mau Poles Piala Dunia U-20 Sekeren Opening Asian Games?
06 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

FOKUS BERITA
Duet Wishnutama-Angela TanoeJakarta - Indonesia ditunjuk sebagai tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 pada 2021. Apakah rencana Menparekraf Wishnutama untuk menarik kunjungan turis terkait momen itu?Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif, Wishnutama dan wakilnya Angela menghadiri acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019) kemarin. Mereka pun memaparkan banyak hal, dari bagaimana pengembangan pariwisata, devisa, dan lainnya.BACA JUGA: Tiket Pesawat Mahal Buat Liburan, Bagaimana Wishnutama?Track Record Wishnutama di bidang kreatif tak usah diragukan lagi. Lewat tangan dinginnya, pembukaan opening ceremony Asian Games 2018 dibuat spektakuler dan mencuri perhatian dunia.Beberapa tahun mendatang tepatnya di tahun 2021, FIFA menunjuk sebagai tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20. Apakah kembali, Wishnutama akan memolesnya lagi?"Kami bisa buat sedemikian rupa, menarik seperti Asian Games. Itu tugas kami," jawabnya."Unsur kreatif bisa memberikan dampak yang besar pada event semacam itu," lanjutnya.BACA JUGA: Wishnutama: Menteri-menteri Sangat Cair dan MenyenangkanWishnutama menjelaskan, tugas kementeriannya adalah mengemas dan memanfaatkan ajang Piala Dunia U-20 untuk menarik kunjungan turis. Dia memberikan contoh, event F1 GP Singapura."Lihat deh F1 di Singapura, orang-orang datang nggak hanya nonton balap-balapan. Tapi, orang-orang yang datang ke sana juga sekalian liburan ke Singapura, datang ke berbagai tempat, belanja, dan sebagainya," pungkasnya.Simak Video "Tak Hadiri Wisuda Putrinya karena Pelantikan, Wishnutama Minta Maaf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)
FOKUS BERITA

Duet Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe
text:
Wishnutama Want to Polish the U-20 World Cup as Cool as the Opening of the Asian Games?
Nov 6, 2019, 14:10 by Afif Farhan


Wishnutama (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

NEWS FOCUS
Wishnutama-Angela Tanoe duet Jakarta - Indonesia was appointed as the host of the U-20 World Cup in 2021. What is Menparekraf's wish to draw on tourist visits related to the moment? Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, Wishnutama and his representative Angela attended the Coffee Cup with Mas Tama and Ms. Angela Angela which was held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019) yesterday. They also explained a lot of things, from how the development of tourism, foreign exchange, and others. READ ALSO: Expensive Flight Tickets for Holidays, How to Wish? Priority Track Record Wishnutama in the creative field need not be doubted. Through his cold hand, the opening of the opening ceremony of the 2018 Asian Games was made spectacular and stole the world's attention. The next few years to be exact in 2021, FIFA appointed as the host of the U-20 World Cup. Is it back, Wishnutama will polish it up again? "We can make it in such a way, interesting as the Asian Games. That's our job," he replied. "The creative element can have a big impact on such an event," he continued. READ ALSO: Wishnutama: Minister- Very Liquid and Enjoyable minister Wishnutama explained that the ministry's task was to package and utilize the U-20 World Cup to attract tourist visits. He gave an example, the Singapore F1 GP event. "Look at F1 in Singapore, people come not only watching races. But, people who come there also take a vacation to Singapore, come to various places, shop, and forth, "he concluded. Watch Video" Not Attending Her Daughter's Graduation for Inauguration, Wishnutama Apologize "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (aff / aff)
